content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court case involved three heirs the widow and two sons of the deceased the court determined that the widow is entitled to half of the estate including real estate securities and a car one son inherits a portion of the real estate the car and a share in a company while the other son inherits a portion of the real estate the court also addressed the continuation of the deceaseds business which will be transferred to a limited liability company the heirs agreed to renounce certain shares in the company the estimated value of the entire estate is 25 million euros the court initiated inheritance proceedings after receiving the death certificate and followed the rules of intestate succession since there was no will the court issued a final judgment and forwarded the decision to the land registry for registration the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the deadline required documents and payment of court fees the text is dated october 6 2021 in ljubljana

metadata.cost: 4.554,00 EUR court fees with 25 million EUR inheritance value
metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, company shares
